welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Corte Madera, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, quaint shops, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our lovely town has to offer during your stay. Have a wonderful time!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Metropolitan Oak International Airport, primarily serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting it and following the instructions.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Terminal for domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Napa County Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Napa County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Buchanan Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Buchanan Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Air Terminal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Air Terminal Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
